snippet: A Boston mobster living as a rancher under an assumed name in a remote Idaho town has been sentenced to 28 years in prison after being convicted of attempted murder and racketeering charges, prosecutors said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Boston Mobster Posing as Idaho Rancher Gets 28 Years for Attempted Murder
headline.main: Boston Mobster Posing as Idaho Rancher Gets 28 Years for Attempted Murder

lead_paragraph: A Boston mobster living as a rancher under an assumed name in a remote Idaho town has been sentenced to 28 years in prison after being convicted of attempted murder and racketeering charges, prosecutors said on Tuesday.
